title: IT'S.A.MAD, MAD, MAD.WORLD.1963. DVDR.MULTISUBS[7] -Lindoff.ISO
description:
Description
When an auto-crash victim (Jimmy Durante) reveals that he's hidden a fortune of stolen cash, a star-studded traffic jam of motorists sets out to uncover the money. The film features one of the largest collections of American comedians ever put together on celluloid, resulting in a wacky, far-out treasure hunt filled with sharp one-liners, plenty of pitfalls and double takes, and unstoppable slapstick humor, led by Jonathan Winters, Phil Silvers, Milton Berle, Buddy Hackett, Mickey Rooney, Sid Caesar, and Ethel Merman, among countless others. Spencer Tracy stars as the straight cop who wouldn't mind retiring with his own little nest egg. 

Special Features
Interactive Menus 
Chapter Selection
